nodes.text: The molsume was a large, multilegged predator native to the jungles of Ithor. It had twin poisonous fangs and a jewel-like, iridescent pelt warning potential predators that its flesh was also toxic. Once it scented food, the molsume could attack with high speed. The pelt was very valuable, drawing many hunters to Ithor, including Grummgar and Nysorly, despite the fact that it was illegal to hunt in such a way.
